Class CompanyRepController

java.lang.Object
team5.controllers.UserController
team5.controllers.CompanyRepController
public class CompanyRepController extends UserController
Controller class for managing company representative user interactions. This class handles the company representative menu and delegates actions to appropriate CompanyRepAction implementations. Company representatives can create internships, view their created internships, review student applications, update password, and logout.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepController

      public CompanyRepController(CompanyRep companyRep)
      Constructs a new CompanyRepController for the specified company representative. Initializes action handlers for creating internships, managing internship listings, and reviewing student applications.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the company representative user who will be using this controller

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the company representative menu and handles user input. Provides options to create internships, view created internships, review applications, update password, and logout. The menu continues to display until the representative chooses to logout or exits after changing their password.
      Specified by:
      showMenu in class UserController
